subject: Horse Racing
Kentucky Derby
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
lead_paragraph: Larry Jones, who has two prime contenders in Friday’s Kentucky Oaks, is renowned for his ability to develop fillies. Last April, though, he was seriously injured when a 2-year-old tossed him.
snippet: Larry Jones, who has two prime contenders in Friday’s Kentucky Oaks, is renowned for his ability to develop fillies. Last April, though, he was seriously injured when a 2-year-old tossed him.
